comment: if you are an auditory learner, she's the one for you! She'll teach you a word and start using it right away so pay attention. She abbreviates every word when she teaches so following along is difficult.  Overall, good teacher, but if you are a visual learner, YOU HAVE TO TAKE JENNIFER SMITH.
She was a very good Prof., I did very well in the course, I studied hard, but the work was fair and so were the exams. Would highly recommend taking her!!

Dr. Popova is an amazing professor who genuinely cares about the success of her students. She makes a pretty difficult topic pretty easy. Attendance is not necessary but will help you a bunch. She offers a bunch of extra credit. I absolutely bombed all my exams but extra credit brought me back up. Take her!

Good professor, very kind and wants to help. There are weekly hw's, but she helps go over them in class. The class is hard but you really do just need to put in the work outside of class. She is helpful in making it as best of an experience as it can be.

Great professor, she knows what she's talking about and knows how to explain it best. The material itself can be difficult at times, but if you go to class, study, and do the extra practice you'll be fine.

She is an amazing professor who makes succeeding in this class very simple if you just do the work. The homework gives unlimited attempts, and the quizzes have two attempts which makes it easy to do well both. She does not require attendance but I HIGHLY recommend going because that is the not way you are going to learn. Lots of extra credit!!

This class is very easy but that doesn't mean that you shouldn't slack off. I did and ended up with a C when I could've easily gotten an A. She's cares a lot about your grade and gives a ton of extra credit just in case you happen to bomb an exam. Exams are through Proctorio but everything else isn't. I would highly recommend taking her for 2102.

Professor Popova was very kind and always wanted to help. She prepared practice tests and study guides for every test. She was available and always gave our grades back quickly. Virtual exams, HW, and weekly quizzes unproctored on McGraw Hill. Only critique I have is that the lectures were a bit boring, especially if you read the textbook.

I found ACCT 1 draining. Popova had clear instructions & step-by-step notes. I ended the class with an A. Tests are proctored, but very simple if you come to class/pay attention. Plus, lots of extra credit opportunities. Excel project is annoying & time consuming so get it out of the way when assigned! Overall, easy course because of Popova!
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Clear grading criteria--Lots of homework

comment: I took Professor Popova in the fall. She was not a hard grader but there are a lot of assignments. She gives extra credit throughout the semester, and she will not hardly respond to emails. If she does, she responds with... get notes from someone who was in class if you missed that day. There are multiple projects however they are not group based.

Prof. Popova is a very caring professor. I struggled with Accounting 2, but she was willing to work with me during office hours, helped me work through problems, and gave examples. She never made me feel bad for not understanding. If you work hard, your efforts will be noticed. I highly recommend taking her course.

She was an amazing professor!! You could tell she wanted her students to understand the material and was good at answering questions. She made this course way than accounting 1 but you actually have to put in effort by going to class and paying attention.

Her grading is super fair, her tests are online and even her final. Her homework all work towards you retaining information and if you go to class she does problems on the board that are almost the exact same as the homework. She responds super quickly, has one excel project and one tableau and they're both super easy!
Dr. Popova is very sweet and wants all of her students to succeed. This class was much easier for me than accounting 1. Would take one of her classes again in a heartbeat.

She has 3 assignments due nearly every week. Her tests are formatted nearly identical to her practice tests. She's very nice and willing to help. She gives EC for every test. Attendance is not mandatory.

She is very caring and willing to help you. You can also access her outside of class. Going to class will benefit you, but she moves very fast so it can be hard to keep up. There is a smartbook, quiz, and homework due each week and 4 tests and 2 projects. If you have to take accounting, I recommend taking Popova.
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Lots of homework--Accessible outside class

comment: Professor Popova is pretty easy, but the material she teaches in class especially calculations are set up completely different than how you do them on connect (which is where all of your graded assignments are). I had to go back on connect through the practice tests to teach myself and I found going to class only made things more confusing.

Professor Popova speaks very quickly and will move on very quickly. She utilizes the projector to go over fill in the blank documents and scrolls up and down too much and I miss information all the time. Very personable and easy to understand.

Professor Popova wasn't an amazing professor but she wasn't terrible. Her class overall wasn't too hard but I don't think I learned as much as I wanted to. The quizzes every single week on lockdown webcam were obnoxious as well. She wasn't very engaging with students.
Professor Popova is amazing! She makes accounting actually enjoyable.

Dr. Popova is incredible, she makes her class extremely doable, all you have to do is carry your weight and do the work and you'll be fine. She is so kind and wants everyone to succeed, but it's not a cake walk, you're going to have to actually put the effort in. I had the best time learning from her and hope to cross paths with her again! TAKE!

Prof Popova is super sweet. She goes through the material really slow. I probably wouldn't take her again because I prefer a faster paced class, but if you find accounting to be challenging she would be a really good professor for you. All the work is on connect and its a pretty reasonable amount. Take her if you need a little extra help in acct!
Professor Popova is an amazing professor. The material seems easy with her style of teaching. Lectures are engaging and the work is not hard. Show up, do the homework and youâ€™ll get a B minimum.
Clear grading and schedule given. Gives extra credit and offers lots of practice items for quizzes and exams. Use all the connect materials she gives and you'll do great in this class!

This class was very easy with this professor. She gave lots of extra credit, made the chapters understandable, and posted lots of resources that helped us. I highly recommend taking the practice exams because they are so similar to her tests. The only downside is that there is a lot of homework in this class.

Great accounting professor. Class is hard no matter who you take, but she makes it easier. Take her if you can. Lots of extra credit. I got 45 extra credit points which is equal to an extra 4.5 percentage points added to my overall grade. Easy to email and responds fast. Test heavy but I don't think it is her choice.

Compared to Account 2101, 2102 is SUPER easy thanks to this professor. Short quizzes nearly each week, smartbook, packback questions, short homework and 2 projects which all were - except for the Excel project - super easy. Roughly 45-50 bonus points available throughout the whole semester.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: This professor was amazing. She is extremely helpful and makes a hard class easy. This class is by far way easier than financial accounting and her tests aren't unbelievably hard. Just do all connect hw on time and study for tests! Easy A
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Accessible outside class--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: If you don't fall behind, you will make a A in this class!!

Dr. Popova is an amazing teacher, definitely take her as she really cares for her students. It's an easy class if you don't fall behind and she is always willing to help. Such a sweet lady. Chapter quizzes, 2-3 tests a semester, and a lot of homework. She explains the material very well.
Easy A, take this professor!!
A lot of work. She really makes you work for it. Get ready to read and participate.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Get ready to read--Lecture heavy

comment: Dr. Popova is great. She goes through the slides in class & explains to everyone in a way they can understand. Had to use connect for quizzes and hw. 3 tests. 1st one in class with a half page cheat sheet and the last 2 were online on connect. Homework & quizzes got a little tricky but overall it was fine. Gave extra credit. If I can pass u can to!
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria

comment: There are two tests and a final in this class. The first test is in class and the second one and final are online (cheat sheet on the first). There are many points to attain in this class so even if you don't do very well on the tests you can still make a good grade. She is a very kind lady and is willing to work with you if you show her you care.

Explains material very well. It is accounting so lots of assignments (learn smarts and homework- mandatory in all classes though) don't miss these because these points will matter in the end. Gives a lot of extra credit so take advantage. Makes herself very available and wants to see you succeed. I really enjoyed this class Dr Popova is great!

best prof ever. best class ever. she offers SO much extra credit and she is an amazing teacher. Her tests and quizzes are so so so easy and attendance is not mandatory and I still made an A+ even though i barely went to class. Take her! even though her class is super early in the morning take her your GPA will thank you!!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: She was a wonderful professor. Highly recommend for the accounting courses. She was very thorough and detailed and did lots of examples on the board. She breaks it down even further for the people who need that extra help. You have to have the access code to do the homework. DO THE REVIEW, tests are based off hw and practice questions.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--Amazing lectures

comment: Easily one of the best professors at KSU! She makes everything clear and simple. Her tests, homework, and in class assignments are all easy.

She cares about her students & gives you the tools to succeed. Announces in advance when in-class assignments are (graded on participation). She allows a small cheat sheet every exam and gives a good bit of extra credit throughout the semester. Not an "easy A" class bc of the material, but an A is absolutely possible if you put forth the effort.

Professor Popova did a great job teaching this class. Her lectures were clear and concise She offered plenty of feedback and was always available through email and office hours. Only hard test is the final. Do all the homework or else you wont pass. she gives you plenty of extra credit throughout the semester as well.
rating_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK--Clear grading criteria--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Great professor! She is readily available at her office and through email. Goes over a powerpoint for lectures and works a few problems. She makes sure you are prepared for the tests and the projects. Participation is important as there are in-class assignments almost every week, however that is a faculty wide so it will be that way in any class.

Dr. Popova is a real gem. She genuinely cares about her students and wants them to succeed. There are homeworks and learn smarts due on every chapter, but they aren't hard if you pay attention in class.

does a lot of in-class assignments and goes over a lot of problems in class which is great for people who like to practice problems that are similar to those on the exams. learnsmart and homework assignments due every other week or so. gives opportunities for extra credit.

Best professor ever! You can tell she really cares about each student and wants everyone to succeed. Her study guides and practice tests are SO helpful, you should pass everything with flying colors especially if you study. She gives extra credit with each chapter, it all adds up. Tests are all multiple choice. Take her, she is seriously the best!

Came into this class looking for a the easiest accounting i could find, and to me, it was pretty easy. Homework is easy to BS, and its a big chunk of your grade, so if you dont do well on tests, its not that bad. This class isn't any harder than financial accounting
rating_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK--Clear grading criteria--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Great professor. Always emails back in timely manner. Has flexible office hours if you can't meet during her standard ones. Lots of extra credit opportunities. Makes sure everyone understands before moving on and she's open to feedback from students. Definitely recommend her whether you're an accounting major or not!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Dr. Popova is awesome and only wants you to succeed and understand accounting. She tries to not over-lecture her class to death and will break it up. You can tell she really cares about her students and knows that everyone has different learning styles, which shows up in her teaching. I would definitely take her again.
